channel.title: Guide on KRS
channel.description: Recent content in Guide on KRS

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This AI-powered tool empowers you to manage your Kubernetes clusters with ease. Dive into the guide to unlock KRS’s functionalities: Intelligent recommendations Proactive problem detection Powerful health checks Ready to streamline your Kubernetes experience? Let’s get going!

item.title: Manual
item.description: KRS empowers you to manage your Kubernetes clusters with the help of cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence. This guide equips you with everything you need to get started and unlock the potential of KRS’s intelligent recommendations, proactive problem detection, and powerful health checks. Prerequisites Up and Running Kubernetes Cluster: Ensure you have a Kubernetes cluster running locally (e.g., Minikube, etc) or in the cloud (e.g., Amazon EKS, Google Kubernetes Engine, etc), if on the cloud, ensure that you’ve secured a config file, before using KRS.
